thread.title: Neighbor to Neighbor Food Pantry - Winamac, IN
thread.title_full: ACityDiscount reviewed by Neighbor to Neighbor Food Pantry - Winamac, IN

author: Neighbor to Neighbor Food Pantry - Winamac, IN
title: Neighbor to Neighbor Food Pantry - Winamac, IN
text: ACityDiscount is awesome!!! This entire process was so easy - start to finish. I spoke with only friendly, professional people who seemed to be genuinely interested that I have a great experience with them. My merchandise came sooner than I expected but I was thrilled to get the call. Even the delivery man - Richard - was fantastic. I would definitely recommend this company and when I get the funding for a stand up freezer, I plan to purchase it through you!
